lines.text: standard operating systems such as windows
and Ubuntu without any modifications . This helps
in installing a variety of OSs without a
problem . Whereas on a para-virtualized gystem,
the core of the OS has to modified &
recompiled for it to be aware of other VMS.
This is a tedious task & therefore very few
MEO This modification is often discouraged by
